studentReviews.name: Sahil Thakur
studentReviews.text: Imarticus Learning offers the best data science education. Thank you for the effort you put in during the pandemic. It is my pleasure to thank the management, the trainers, the placement team, and all those involved with the institute.

studentReviews.name: Pavani Iytla
studentReviews.text: Thanks to Imarticus, I was placed with State Street Bank where I can contribute to my professional development in the most effective manner. Because of my interest in finance, I took the plunge into Investment Banking, and Imarticus made it possible for me to achieve this goal.

studentReviews.name: Aman Sinha
studentReviews.text: I am grateful to the training and placement department of Imarticus Learning for their ongoing efforts in imparting quality training and providing opportunities for placement. I can't express how much your support helped me secure a job at Genpact.

studentReviews.name: Komal Boraste
studentReviews.text: With Imarticus Learning, I have completed a postgraduate program in Data Analytics. Overall, I had a positive learning experience. The faculty is very knowledgeable and supportive as well. With the help of the soft skill sessions and mock interviews, I was able to prepare for interviews with confidence. Thank you Imarticus!

studentReviews.name: Rudraksh Gandhi
studentReviews.text: Being a part of Imarticus Learning has been a delightful experience. I gained a lot of knowledge about investment banking, which I believe will prove useful in the long run. Thanks to placement support from the placement team, I got my dream job in the core industry. I would recommend this program to anybody who wants to enter the finance field.

studentReviews.name: Ajay Rautela
studentReviews.text: I am grateful to be a part of Imarticus where I can grow. The entire faculty and department leave no stone unturned to shape one's future. I would like to appreciate the placement cell at Imarticus.

studentReviews.name: Bipasha Sikarwar
studentReviews.text: After completing graduation in B.Com I chose a career in data analytics. Being from a non-technical background, this was quite new. But joining a course from Imarticus Learning has been my best decision. The class gave me a great overview of the foundations that data analysis is built upon. The trainers and coordinators were very polite and helpful. Thank you Imarticus for being a part of my journey.

studentReviews.name: Prasanna Kumar Rout
studentReviews.text: With Imarticus, I gained a lot of knowledge about investment banking and the various services investment banks offer. The faculty and staff were very cooperative and made studying worthwhile by doing their best. Thank you to the entire placement team for my success. I want to express my sincere gratitude to Geetika Ma'am for responding to my queries so quickly. I greatly appreciate your help and support throughout the placement process.

studentReviews.name: Posheen Rajdan
studentReviews.text: Imarticus Learning offered me overall growth in terms of academics as well as personal growth. Thank you Imarticus!

news_arr.desc: To strengthen professionals’ skillsets and understanding of Financial Services, IIM Lucknow and Imarticus Learning, India’s front-running professional education firm, launch an Advanced Management Program in Financial Services and Capital Markets.

Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee, in partnership with professional education firm Imarticus Learning will commence the second batch of the Supply Chain Management course from April 23. It is a six month long online certification course for professionals.

The Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta (IIM) has launched an Executive Programme in Investment Banking and Capital Markets (EPIBCM) in association with Imarticus Learning. It is a one-year-long programme, which would have three foundation modules and seven advanced modules.

With customers being the core of any business enterprise, studying customer preferences, needs and behaviors is critical in formulating successful operational and marketing strategies. As a result, companies require tech-savvy customer insight analysts (CIA) to make sense of the vast quantities of customer data they collect on a constant basis.

header.basic: Make data-driven decisions using data science skills

about_course.header: About our Certificate Program in Data Science and Machine learning
about_course.data: The Certificate Program in Data Science and Machine Learning is designed to get you started on the path of data science and machine learning. Built with iHUB DivyaSampark @IIT Roorkee, this program will teach you the fundamentals and aspects of data science and machine learning while equipping you with the proper knowledge to implement and apply these concepts to real-world problems. Learn data mining and machine learning tools with Python and how to use data-driven insights to positively impact organizational growth in this 5-month program designed by acclaimed IIT faculty members.
about_course.data1: This data science program will enable learners to build a strong foundation in data science and specialize in machine learning with Python for data-driven decision-making. Through this program, we aim to develop professionals who can provide meaningful insights from data and help businesses make the right decisions for growth.
about_course.icon_data1: Make data-driven decisions using data science skills
about_course.icon_data2: Earn a premium certificate issued collectively by iHUB DivyaSampark @ IIT Roorkee and Department of Science & Technology (DST)

about_partner.data: iHUB DivyaSampark, a section 8 company (Non-Government Organization), is a Technology Innovation Hub at IIT Roorkee and is set up under the National Mission on Interdisciplinary Cyber-Physical Systems (NM-ICPS), initiated by the Department of Science & Technology (DST) to build innovative solutions, to train manpower and encourage entrepreneurship for the world’s current challenges like affordable health care, Industry 4.0 and sustainable smart cities. iHUB DivyaSampark aims to enable an innovative ecosystem in new-age technologies like AI, ML, Drones, Robots, data analytics (often called CPS technologies) and become the source for the next generation of digital technologies, products and services by promoting, enhancing core competencies, capacity building, manpower training to provide solutions for national strategic sectors and becoming a key contributor to Digital India.

data1.name: Prof. Sudeb Dasgupta
data1.data: "We’re delighted to partner with Imarticus Learning, one of the leaders in Edtech. We’ve strived to bring foremost education to our learners and provide them guidance for research and innovation. iHUB DivyaSampark @ IIT Roorkee fosters research innovation towards product/technology development in the areas of Healthcare, Industry 4.0 and Smart Cities. Through this association with Imarticus, we’re taking a step ahead in that direction. We bring iHUB DivyaSampark's expertise in building outstanding programs with IITs and Imarticus' technical expertise to deliver an outstanding learning experience through a holistic approach. Together, we envision creating a skilled workforce for innovation and digital growth."

data1.name: Manish Anand
data1.data: We are very excited about this partnership with Imarticus Learning. Skill development is one of the mandates of the National Mission on Interdisciplinary Cyber-Physical System (NM-ICPS) as it will prepare India for Industry 4.0 and Society 5.0. I am very sure that this partnership between iHUB DivyaSampark, a Technology Innovation Hub at IIT Roorkee will help India in achieving Skill development-related goals in new-age technologies like AI/ML and ultimately achieve the bigger goal of Aatmanirbhar Bharat and Digital India.

data1.name: Dr R. Balasubramanian
data1.data: Emerging technologies and rapid digital transformation are changing the outlook of every industry today and data have become the most critical element. Organizations, government bodies, and businesses need to make data-driven decisions for growth. With the growing demand for data insights, the demand for professionals with data science skills within every organization has increased exponentially. However, learning and mastering data science skills to make data-driven decisions is difficult. iHUB DivyaSampark has developed this data science program with Imarticus Learning which builds a strong foundation of data science and creates specialization in machine learning with Python for data-driven decision making. Through this program, we aim to develop professionals who could provide meaningful insights from data and help businesses make the right decisions for growth.

certificate.icon_head: Designed by the IIT faculty for early and mid-level professionals
certificate.icon_data: The program has been designed by IIT faculty and industry experts. It will enable learners to build a strong foundation in data science and specialize in machine learning with Python for data-driven decision-making. Through this program, we aim to develop professionals who can provide meaningful insights from data and help businesses make the right decisions for growth.

certificate.icon_head: Live training by IIT faculty and industry experts
certificate.icon_data: The program will be delivered live through online sessions with the top faculty of India. The faculty belong to IIT Roorkee, IIT Guwahati, IIT Ropar and other premier institutes. The industry experts have extensive experience working on data science and machine learning projects across multiple organizations.

certificate.icon_head: Campus Immersion at iHUB Divyasampark @IIT Roorkee
certificate.icon_data: Participate in 2-day campus immersion at iHUB DivyaSampark @IIT Roorkee (Greater Noida campus) and get an opportunity to connect with the IIT faculty and your peers. Visit the iHUB DivyaSampark startup incubation centre to pitch your startup idea in Healthcare, Industry 4.0 and Sustainable smart cities. Terms and conditions apply.

Under the Digital India support scheme, iHUB DivyaSampark@ IIT Roorkee will provide a platform for enthusiastic startup-minded learners to pitch their startup idea and get funding support. It is an exciting opportunity for enthusiastic learners who want to start their own business and build something they are really proud of.

certificate.icon_head: Program coordinated by Dr Balasubramanian – selected as top ML faculty in India:
certificate.icon_data: This program will be coordinated by Dr Balasubramanian Raman who has been selected as the top academician in data science and ML. Dr Balasubramanian Raman is a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee. He is also a Joint Faculty in the Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at IIT Roorkee.

certificate.icon_head: Certification by iHUB DivyaSampark @ IIT Roorkee and Department of Science & Technology
certificate.icon_data: The program certificate will be issued collectively by iHUB DivyaSampark @ IIT Roorkee, Department of Science & Technology (DST) and Imarticus Learning under The National Mission on Interdisciplinary Cyber-Physical Systems (NM-ICPS). This certification by nationally-recognised bodies will enhance the learners’ profiles and help them stand out.

data.data1: Tableau Interface and Basic Chart Types

points.data: Build a predictive model to predict the property valuations.
Learn how analytics is used by real-estate companies.
Predict if a patient has been given a particular vaccine based on various medical attributes.
Learn how analytics is used by healthcare professionals/hospitals.
Predict taxi fares in a busy city using various journey related attributes, just like Uber and Ola.
Learn how analytics is used by online transportation companies like Uber and Ola.
Build a predictive model to predict if a person suffers from a heart disease.
Learn how analytics is used by healthcare professional/hospitals.

faculty.name: Dr R. Balasubramanian
faculty.department: Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering
faculty.data: Prof. Balasubramanian Raman received his PhD degree from IIT Madras, India, in 2001 and served as a Post-Doctoral Fellow at the University of Missouri, Columbia, the USA, and a Post-Doctoral Associate at the State University of New Jersey, USA. He has also served as a Lecturer at the Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, India, a Guest Scientist at the International Centre for Theoretical Physics Trieste, ITALY, and a Visiting Professor at the University of Windsor, CANADA. He has been with the Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee, India, since 2004, where he is currently working as a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering and a Joint Faculty in the Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. In addition, he has held visiting research positions at various international universities. He is the recipient of the BOYSCAST fellowship, awarded by the Department of Science and Technology, India. He has supervised 28 PhD students (08 ongoing), delivered 20 Industrial R&D projects (5 ongoing), and published over 200 papers in international journals, conferences, and books of international reputation. His research areas include Machine Learning, Image and Video Processing, Medical Imaging, Computer Vision, Activity Recognition, Pattern Recognition, Privacy-Preserving Computing, and Data Security.

faculty.name: Dr Subrahmanyam Murala
faculty.department: Associate Professor, Department of Electrical Engineering
faculty.data: Dr Subrahmanyam Murala received a B.E. degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Andhra University, Andhra Pradesh, India, in 2007. Afterwards, he received his M.Tech. and PhD degrees from the Department of Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, Roorkee, India, in 2009 and 2012. He was a Post-Doctoral Researcher in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Windsor, Windsor, ON, Canada, from July 01, 2012, to June 30, 2014. Currently, He is working as an Associate Professor in the Department of Electrical Engineering, IIT Ropar, Rupnagar, Punjab, India. His primary fields of interest are Image Restoration, Computer Vision, Medical Image Processing, and Object Detection.

faculty.name: Dr Santosh Kumar Vipparthi
faculty.department: Assistant Professor, Mehta Family School of Data Science and AI
faculty.data: Dr Santosh Kumar Vipparthi, a Senior Member of IEEE, has 11+ years of experience in academia and industry. Dr Vipparthi focuses on visual perception tasks such as human emotion recognition, cognitive state assessment, gesture recognition, change detection, object detection, image retrieval, motion analysis, aberrant event detection, and identification. He has been awarded a Ph.D. and M.Tech from the Indian Institute of Technology Varanasi (IIT Varanasi), BHU, and B.Tech from Andhra University.  Currently, he is working in the Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati).

faculty.name: Kumar Sundaram
faculty.data: Kumar is an Industry Expert who is fascinated by the research happening in the Data Science/ML space & enjoys solving problems.  He holds a rich experience of fulfilling end-to-end consulting /analytics requirements for corporate marketing strategies and Deriving Go to Market strategies for different markets/services/channels/aspirational accounts. Kumar’s tech expertise includes Analytics/Machine Learning using SAS/R/Python/Tableau/Excel.He has extensive experience in building technical teams & products Vast experience in business development pertaining to schools, universities, and educational institutions by large.He has gained knowledge and Expertise in Underwriting Strategies, Risk Scores & Modeling, Analytics, Transformation ,and Risk and Information Management.

testimonial.name: Zulfiqar Habibuddin Shaikh
testimonial.content: I enrolled at Imarticus Learning Pune in a postgraduate program in Data Analytics. It was my privilege to be mentored and trained by some really excellent trainers throughout the course. This course incorporates the latest tools and technologies in data science and analytics that the industry demands. Furthermore, the course provides assignments to allow you to gain a firm understanding of the concepts. Every member of the Imarticus team works collaboratively. The team has a dedicated placement cell. Thanks to the Imarticus Learning team for helping me find a job.

QnA.head: How will I learn during the course?
QnA.data: You will learn through live online sessions with faculty from IIT and other premier institutes. The industry experts will help you learn practical applications of data science concepts to real-world problems. There will be more than 10 exercises and projects. During the online sessions, you will get an opportunity to discuss with peers from different professional backgrounds and experiences. Your doubts will be resolved in live sessions to help you learn. There will be assessments to help you identify gaps and improve on them.

QnA.head: What if I miss a class?
QnA.data: Every live session will be recorded and the recordings will be available for your reference on the learning platform. If you missed a class, you can go through the recorded session and cover the topics. Though, we recommend not missing any class for effective learning.

QnA.head: What is the attendance policy?
QnA.data: It is recommended that you attend each live training session. However, you need to attend at least 80% of the live sessions to be eligible for certification.

QnA.head: What is the admission process?
QnA.data: Once you have submitted your interest in the program, our advisor will connect with you and help you understand the program better. The advisor will take your academic and professional details. Your profile will be reviewed and you will receive an admission offer if your profile meets all the criteria.

QnA.head: Is there any placement assistance?
QnA.data: This program helps learners become ready for data-driven decision making roles. The learners can look forward to job roles like data analyst, business analyst, data scientist, team lead, manager, etc. We will help you prepare for such jobs through our career services. It includes resume and LinkedIn profile building and interview preparation sessions. The industry experts will guide you on how to prepare for job interviews and conduct mock interviews.

QnA.head: What is Campus Immersion?
QnA.data: After completing the course, you will get an opportunity to participate in a 2-day campus immersion program at iHUB Divyasampark @IIT Roorkee (Greater Noida campus). It is a great platform to connect with the IIT faculty and your peers. You can also visit the iHUB startup incubation centre to pitch your startup idea in Healthcare, Industry 4.0 and Sustainable smart cities. Terms and conditions apply.

section1.heading: Interested In Becoming An Imarticus Admission Partner?

section2.heading: Grow Your Business Exponentially
section2.data: If you are interested in providing vocational training along with assured placements and transforming careers while growing your business, this is an opportunity for you. As a partner, you will gain access to promote Imarticus leading programs and be instrumental in changing the education landscape with us.

section3.heading: Work With Us To Deliver Outstanding Learning Experiences
data: Partner with the industry's most reputed education ecosystem, Imarticus Learning. At Imarticus, we are dedicated to bringing progressive and future-focused education to our students.

With over 1,00,000 learners and 500 partnerships with leading institutions and corporations, gain access to an extensive network of opportunities.Join us as an admission partner in our efforts to provide top of the line programs and assured placements to aspiring candidates.

section4.heading: Build Your Business With Imarticus
points: Semi-monthly payouts to manage your business expenses.
Use our brand name in your office.
Counsel students for various assured placement programs.
Admit students to both classroom and online programs.
Get dedicated branding support from Imarticus to grow your business.
Lead management software to organise leads.
Staffing support to manage your business.

section5.heading: Authorised Admission Partner Model – Elite Business Partner Club
points: Integration with Imarticus’ internal systems and dedicated email id

section6.heading: Get Connected To The Industry’s Most Powerful Educator Network
section6.data: Imarticus is the only Edtech company that provides a holistic learning experience with a complete ecosystem of programs, resources and technologies in an integrated approach. We continuously develop comprehensive solutions to suit the changing times, needs and demands of the learners to accelerate student achievement. We offer online and in-class programs at twelve centres, including Mumbai, Pune, Delhi, Bangalore, Lucknow, Hyderabad and Chennai, Jaipur, Patna, Coimbatore, Kolkata, Ahmedabad. We're renowned for our state of the art facilities and foremost programs in the fields of banking, finance, fintech, analytics, data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.

section7.heading: Lead The Way With
section7.data: As an Authorised Admission Partner, you would enjoy all the benefits and leverage our extensive network with Imarticus. Join us in our endeavour to establish a robust ecosystem for education in India.

section8.heading: Eligibility
points: Pay a nominal sign-up fee to become an Admission Partner.
Workforce comprising of a caller and a business development executive or above.
Connect with the local institutions and network consisting of students and working professionals.
Acceptance of the terms and conditions.
section8.notedata: We will be happy to discuss and share our detailed terms and conditions before the agreement process. Admission Partners cannot collect fees or any other charges from the students or candidates. Imarticus will manage all fees and payments.

about.head: Forward-looking Curriculum
about.data: You will learn the foundational elements of capital structure, treasury, and risk management along with new-age components such as evolving CFO responsibilities, Fintech, and tech-driven financial services.

about.head: IIM Indore Executive Education Alumni Status
about.data: As an IIM Indore executive alumni you will have access to IIM Indore's campus library and an IIM Indore email id through the lifetime alumni membership.

about.head: Peer Learning and Networking
about.data: You will get an opportunity to meet and interact with your peers and industry experts as part of this program. Network and build meaningful relationships by sharing your experiences.

about.head: Masterclasses with Industry Experts
about.data: Learn and interact with leading CFOs to get real-world insight into the financial realm and lead organizational change.

partner.head: Established in 1996, the Indian Institute of Management Indore (IIM Indore) has been a leader in the field of management education, interfacing with the industry, government and PSUs. It is promoted and nurtured by the Ministry of Education, Government of India and is an institute of national importance under the Indian Institutes of Management Act 2017. They are at the forefront of providing carefully curated programs that cater to the needs of executives. IIM Indore is renowned for its focus on academic excellence, reinforced by the Triple Crown accreditation that IIM Indore has achieved. Being the second IIM to receive this achievement and being among the top 1% of business schools globally to have the Triple Crown accreditation, their executive education programs are contextually relevant to meet the demands of contemporary business challenges.

card.name: Nikhil Barshikar
card.background: Founder and Managing Director, Imarticus Learning
card.head: We're pleased to announce our collaboration with IIM Indore, one of India's finest institutes in management education. We have combined IIM Indore's expertise with Imarticus' excellence in delivering outstanding executive education to deliver this program. With this program, we want to provide top-of-the-line finance education to aspiring CFOs. We look forward to a long-term and mutually beneficial association with IIM Indore.

data.data1: Role of Board and Audit Committee
Regulations and Supervisions in Digital Businesses
Crisis Management and Communicating During Disruptions
Ethical Dilemmas, Anti-Bribery, and Anti-Corruption Regulations
Masterclass 12: The Responsible CFO: Peep into Data, Ethics and ESG

points.data: This is one of the most popular case studies in the Harvard Case Collection to understand effective use of various Supply Chain drivers such as inventory, information, and facilities. 7-Eleven is a Japanese company operating in the convenience store industry having a large presence in Japan and various other markets.

Alko is a company dealing in lighting fixtures. The case study is designed to understand annual inventory and distribution cost of the existing inventory system. The case discusses the change in inventory policy to minimize the cost of annual inventory.

project.head: Predictive Analytics Project for Demand Forecasting

points.data: Course participants will do a project on demand forecasting using data analytics. The forecasting will be done for entire Supply Chain using regression techniques. Data of different sources of social media will be used to understand the use of analytical tools for forecasting.

Decision Tree models will be used to manage uncertainties in Supply Chain networks. Participants will be asked to collect data from secondary sources for different types of Supply Chain. It will help them to make decisions which can minimize the risk.

faculty.name: Prof. Mehul Raithatha
faculty.data: Dr Mehul Raithatha is a faculty in finance and accounting. He has done his doctorate from S J Mehta School of Management, Indian Institute of Technology Bombay. His doctoral dissertation was in the area of Financial Reporting and Compliance. He holds a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) degree from ICFAI University and M.Com.(Accounting) from Mumbai University. Before joining IIM Indore, he was faculty at IFMR Chennai. His research interests include financial reporting, corporate governance, audit quality, and earnings quality. His teaching interests include Financial Accounting and Reporting, Cost and Management Accounting, and Financial Analysis.

faculty.name: Prof. Debasish Maitra
faculty.data: Prof. Debasish Maitra is a faculty in finance and accounting. He is a fellow from the Institute of Rural Management Anand (IRMA), India. Before joining IIM Indore, he was with IMT Ghaziabad. His research interests include the interplay between risk and bank performance during post-financial crisis, commodity markets (development,co-movements with other markets, and regulatory issues), volatility dynamics of markets, the influence of macroeconomics on different asset markets, derivatives listing/delisting, and its effects on stock returns, and non-linear relationships among factors affecting stock returns and volatility over different investment horizons.

QnA.head: Will all students receive the certificate of successful completion?
QnA.data: Successful candidates will receive a Certificate of Successful Completion from IIM Indore. Candidates will not qualify for successful completion if they have an 'F' grade in 50% of the courses or/and overall attendance for the program is less than 75%. The program and courses will follow a relative grading schema for evaluation.

QnA.head: What are the admissions criteria?
QnA.data: Admission is on profile-based selection. Resumes will be reviewed by the Admissions team and IIM Indore Executive Education team.

QnA.head: Do you accept corporate nominations?
QnA.data: Corporate nominations will be encouraged, and a special offer of a minimum of five nominations exists. In addition, a discount of up to 10% on the program fee may be offered for bulk nominations of 5 participants or more from a single corporate. However, the extent of the discount will be determined on a case-to-case basis.

QnA.head: How will you evaluate our progress through the course?
QnA.data: You will be evaluated through quizzes, assignments, online exams, presentations, and projects.

QnA.head: How long is the course?
QnA.data: Classes are being planned for every Saturday / Sunday between 6 pm to 9 pm.

QnA2.head: Is there any loan facility?
QnA2.data: Yes, there is. Please talk to our counselor for more details.

QnA3.data3: Within 2 weeks of Admission Offer Release or Application Round Closure Date, whichever is earlier

faculty2.name: Nikhil Barshikar
faculty2.background: Founder and Managing Director, Imarticus Learning
faculty2.data: The digital age has heralded a new era in which technology and digital abilities are at the fore. We are committed to providing our students with the greatest quality education possible, and our collaboration with IIT Roorkee is another step in that direction. Imarticus is proud to join with IIT Roorkee to provide a top-notch digital marketing program for students interested in gaining a comprehensive understanding of digital marketing and a competitive advantage in the digital world.

faculty2.name: Prof. Kalpak Kulkarni
faculty2.data: Kalpak Kulkarni is an Assistant Professor of Marketing at the Department of Management Studies, Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, Roorkee. Previously he was associated with Goa Institute of Management, Goa. He has completed his doctoral studies at the Shailesh J. Mehta School of Management, IIT Bombay. His research deals with understanding processes and factors that influence consumers' evaluation of new-age media and communication formats like viral advertisements and moment marketing campaigns.

about.head: Learn Job-Relevant Skills
about.data: Build a rewarding digital marketing and MarTech career by learning the latest tools and techniques, understanding emerging trends, algorithms and working on real-world digital marketing projects.

about.head: Gain a Certification from IIT Roorkee
about.data: Upgrade your profile and become the preferred candidate at every job interview.

about.head: Learn from IIT Faculty
about.data: Learn from the best trainers and faculty in India through live online sessions and discussions.

about.head: Get Mentored By Industry Experts
about.data: Our highly-skilled program mentors will assist you through the program and encourage you to move towards your goals.

unique.head: INDUSTRY-SPECIFIC TRAINING
unique.data: Get a comprehensive overview of digital marketing and MarTech and learn practical applications through case studies.

unique.head: CURRICULUM
unique.data: Our leading-edge curriculum is tailored to provide you with in-demand skills, an effective understanding of the subject matter and its practical application.

unique.head: EXTENSIVE CAREER SUPPORT
unique.data: We tailor our training and offer placement support to help you achieve your unique career goals through resume enhancements and interview preparation.

unique.head: CAMPUS IMMERSION
unique.data: Get an opportunity to visit the IIT Roorkee campus, interact with your peers and experience what campus life feels like at IIT Roorkee.

Opportunities in Digital Marketing in India
Digital Marketing Mix and Digital Models
Site Content and Design - Rules and Frameworks

Methods and Best Practices for Traffic Building

Interacting with Customers on Social Media
Free and Paid Traffic for E-commerce
Personal Branding in a Digital World
Getting Ready for Digital Marketing Roles

points.data: Tata Motors used social media to reposition itself as a modern and futuristic brand, and broke the stereotype of being old fashioned.
Be Beautiful, an online fashion website by HUL, used content marketing strategies to cater to the fashion needs of women.
Cadbury, India’s largest chocolate brand, used a clever strategy on social media to drive a successful campaign against cyberbullying.

faculty.name: Prof. Kalpak Kulkarni
faculty.data: Kalpak Kulkarni is an Assistant Professor of Marketing at the Department of Management Studies, Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, Roorkee. Previously he was associated with Goa Institute of Management, Goa. He has completed his doctoral studies at the Shailesh J. Mehta School of Management, IIT Bombay. His research deals with understanding processes and factors that influence consumers' evaluation of new-age media and communication formats like viral advertisements and moment marketing campaigns.

faculty.name: Prof. Saurabh Arora
faculty.data: Sourabh Arora is an Assistant Professor at DoMS, IIT Roorkee. He worked as an assistant professor at XLRI, Jamshedpur. He earned a PhD from IIT Kharagpur and MBA in Marketing from the University School of Management, Kurukshetra University. His areas of interest include Consumer Behaviour, Showrooming, Webrooming and Multi-channel Shopping.

faculty.name: Nitesh Kuchhal
faculty.data: Nitesh Kuchhal is an Alumnus of IIM Calcutta (2011-13). He has over 6 years of experience in Digital Marketing. He is the founder & CEO of a Gurgaon based Digital Marketing & Digital Product Startup - Purple Brick Consulting. He has hands-on experience in nearly all facets of digital marketing - Marketing Automation, Email Marketing, Content Marketing, Web & Data Analytics, SEO, Google Search Advertising, Social Media Marketing (Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram).Nitesh excels in helping companies grow by leveraging the power of digital platforms. He drives business results through communication strategies rooted in his deep understanding of consumer behaviour. He is passionate about building teams & setting sustainable & scalable processes to deliver business results. Known for his systematic planning & eye for detail, he ensures that diverse business functions collaborate and reach business goals.Prior to plunging into digital marketing, he was also a co-founder of an Ed-tech company. He has taken guest lectures on Digital Marketing at IIT Roorkee and IMT Ghaziabad.

QnA.head: Where do I attend these live classes?
QnA.data: You can attend these classes from anywhere on your laptop with an internet connection. You can join the class through a link shared with all the students before the beginning of the class.

QnA.head: How do I enroll in the course?
QnA.data: You can start by filling up your application form. If you clear the minimum criteria, then you will have to go through the interview. Once you are selected for the interview, then you can enrol in this digital marketing and MarTech course.

QnA.head: What if I miss a class?
QnA.data: All the lectures will be available for the students to view on Imarticus Learning’s LMS platform after the class is over. However, you will not be able to ask direct questions to the Professor or TAs for that class.

QnA.head: Is there any attendance or minimum score policy for the Digital Marketing and MarTech course?
QnA.data: Yes, the minimum attendance policy for the complete course is 80% and minimum marks in all assessments for successful course completion is 50%. You will also need to complete all the assignments and projects as per the instructions.

QnA.head: What is the duration of the campus immersion module?
QnA.data: There is a 3-day campus immersion module at IIT Roorkee during which participants will visit the IIT Roorkee campus to interact with their peers and learn from faculty. However, this is subject to the COVID-19 situation. The cost of travel and accommodation will be borne by the students.

QnA.head: Will IIT Roorkee be helping with the placements?
QnA.data: No. Placement assistance will be offered by Imarticus. IIT Roorkee will be involved in the training and certification of the students.

QnA.head: How will the career services work?
QnA.data: The career services will be provided by Imarticus to the students who complete the course. We will help you build your resume, prepare you with workshops and mock interviews.

QnA.head: When will live sessions be conducted?
QnA.data: The live sessions will be scheduled on weekends – Saturday and Sunday. The timings will be communicated during counselling.

QnA.head: Does IIT faculty deliver live sessions?
QnA.data: Yes, an IIT faculty will train you on the conceptual topics and help you build a strong foundation for digital marketing and MarTech. Industry experts will provide hands-on learning through projects and exercises.

QnA2.head: What is the payment structure?
QnA2.data: The payment for the digital marketing and MarTech course can be made through credit card, debit card and net banking. One can either complete the process with a direct one-time payment or pay with equal monthly instalments with a bank loan.

QnA2.head: What is the refund policy for this program?
QnA2.data: 20% of the program fee is set aside as a non-refundable amount. The balance amount will be refunded only as per the final decision made by IIT Roorkee and Imarticus management depending on the case.

QnA2.head: Are there any scholarships available for this program?
QnA2.data: Yes, we have scholarships available based on merit and experience. Please reach out to your program advisor for more details.

header.header1: How to become a Next-Gen Data Scientist

speaker.name: Mr. Karthik C
speaker.background: An industry expert with more than 10 years of experience in the data science domain

speaker.name: Mr. Jason Doe
speaker.background: An industry expert with more than 10 years of experience in the data science domain

data.data: Artificial intelligence continues to be a potent transformation driver for global industries and businesses. Given the rapid evolution of technology, the need for new-age data scientists is also increasing.
Understand the various qualities that the current industry expects from data scientists and what the future holds for them.

For organizations, data science can enable the development of a new generation of products and services, machinery, farming, healthcare, fashion and tourism. It can boost sales, improve machine maintenance, increase production output and quality, improve customer service, as well as save energy.

Get valuable insights from our esteemed alumni placed at top analytics firms like Tiger Analytics, Evoke Technologies, E&Y, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, TransOrg Analytics, Gain Insight and Team Computers.
Join us for this in-depth webinar to explore lessons and opportunities in the data science industry.
Top data science trends in 2022
Qualities of a next-gen Data Scientist
Data science project roadmap
What do organizations look for?
Q&A and interaction with alumni

speaker.name: Mr. Karthik C
speaker.background: An industry expert with more than 10 years of experiencein the data science domain

data.data: Karthik has 10+ years of experience in the data science domain where he worked with companies like Mu Sigma and Amazon. He has solved a diverse set of business problems for various Fortune 100 clients leveraging his experience in Machine Learning (ML), Text Analytics, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Deep Learning using scripting languages like SAS, R, Scala and Python.

Karthik graduated from R.V. College of Engineering (Bangalore). He started his career at Mu Sigma as a Business Analyst by building various statistical and ML models to solve business problems for over 3.5 years. He then joined Infogain to set up their Analytics Centre of Excellence (CoE). He spent 5 years at Amazon as a Pricing Analytics SME to build various pricing strategies with the help of automation and machine learning to help deliver the best prices to customers across the globe. Thereafter, he was heading the Alexa AI (Knowledge) for the ANZ region to help Alexa get smarter and engage better through various NLP techniques.
While working with numbers and solving business problems keeps his inquisitive soul excited at work, he thoroughly enjoys mentoring, training and teaching young professionals.

header.header1: Emerging trajectories in logistics and supply chain to look out for in 2022

data.data: The logistics industry in India is anticipated to develop at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10% to USD 215 billion by 2022, thanks to a rebound in consumer demand, booming e-commerce, and a buoyant market, more robust road infrastructure, and shorter travel times.
A few digital transformations are projected in the supply chain and logistics sector in 2022. These innovations should increase operational effectiveness and boost consumer satisfaction.
Attend this complimentary webinar where Prof. Rajat Agrawal from IIT Roorkee will explain the digital transformations we can look ahead to in 2022.
Increased use of technology and digitisation
Increase in tech-enabled procurement
Climate-smart supply chain planning
Careers in supply chain management

Currently, working as a Professor in the Department of Management Studies, IIT Roorkee, Professor Rajat Agrawal is an expert in Operations Management, Supply Chain Management, Quality Management, Inventory Management, and Manufacturing strategy. He has co-authored more than 6 books and more than 100 papers in various national and international journals.

about.head: CERTIFICATION BY CEC, IIT ROORKEE
about.data: Master cyber security skills with an industry-focused curriculum designed by CEC, IIT Roorkee and leaders from the industry. Enhance your profile with a global certification endorsed by CEC, IIT Roorkee and build a strong career in cyber security.

about.head: LEARN FROM IIT FACULTY
about.data: Learn from one of the best faculty in India through live online sessions and discussions. The sessions from the IIT faculty will help you build cyber security concepts, and industry experts will provide hands-on learning for security processes, tools, software and techniques.

about.head: CAMPUS IMMERSION AT IIT ROORKEE
about.data: Get an opportunity to participate in a 3-day campus immersion module and visit the IIT Roorkee campus. Interact with your peers and learn from the IIT faculty during the campus immersion. Terms and conditions apply.

about.head: LEARN JOB-RELEVANT SKILLS
about.data: Industry experts teach you job-relevant skills through rigorous in-class exercises and real-world security projects. Learn the latest tools and technologies to build a strong career in cyber security. Participate in a Capture the Flags competition to test your skills.

data.data1: Networking Topology and Types of Networks
Operating Systems and OS Process & Resource Management
Basic of Internet and Web Applications
AWS Well Architected Framework: Security Pillar
Entry Points on AWS To Maintain the Security
SQL, OS, XSS and CMD Injections
Testing for Vulnerable and Outdated Components

project.heading: Design automated operating detector on the network

points.subdata: Recognise Operating System present at devices in a network. Using TCP/IP stack fingerprinting by crafting custom TCP and UDP packets and analysing their responses. It can also be used for analyzing vendor name, OS name, OS generation, device type etc.

Building a port scanner that can probe a server or host for open ports. This application should have capabilities to verify the security policies of the networks and identify network services running on a host.

project.heading: automated browser/ system credential dumper hardware

points.subdata: An automated tool that can be planted on HID device to retrieve lots of passwords stored on a local computer. Each software stores its passwords using different techniques (plaintext, APIs, custom algorithms, databases, etc.).

Developing Keylogger that should not be detected by security program in the world. Keyloggers are programs used to silently record keystrokes that can be part of a parental control program or as a nefarious program used by remote hackers to steal information.

faculty.name: Dr Sateesh Kumar Peddoju
faculty.data: Dr Sateesh Kumar works as an Associate Professor in the Computer Science and Engineering Department at IIT Roorkee. He is an expert in cyber security with areas of work in cloud computing, network security, behavioural analysis, anomaly detection, DDoS detection, etc. He has co-authored Cloud Computing Systems and Applications in Healthcare, in IGI Publisher, 2017 and Security and Storage Issues in the Cloud Environment, Springer Nature, 2018.

faculty.name: Mr Shubham Gautam
faculty.data: Mr Gautam has extensive experience in the field of cyber security. His areas of specialisation include ethical hacking, penetration testing, cyber security management, network security, and web and application security. He has trained more than 10,000 cyber security professionals and is a mentor for many cyber security startups. He has been a visiting faculty alongside various faculty from CBI and India's top cyber lawyers. He is also a part of the faculty development program by Skill India, Govt. of India and a steering committee member for the National Information Security Council (NISC).

faculty.name: Mr Varun Pathak
faculty.data: Mr Varun is a Cyber Security Faculty and Consultant. He has worked as Cyber Security Consultant at PwC and Network Engineer at Infotel Business Solutions Limited. He has vast experience in administering and securing devices like routers, switches, firewalls, and servers. He has vast experience in executing projects related to Vulnerability Assessment, Penetration Testing and SOC implementation. His recent projects also includes auditing of Network Infrastructure. Data Center, SOC Review, Web Application Security Testing and Troubleshooting multiple network and security issues.

testimonials.name: Achutt Nair

The instructors are experts and it is very clear in the method of teaching. Most of the theories are accompanied with his guided practicals which help get a deeper insight. All my questions were answered and the class interaction is very good.

The faculty from IIT R has been very interactive and the guided assignments really helps us in practicing what we are being taught. Their LMS is pretty convenient to use and all the recordings and resources of the lectures are provided to us. I would recommend this course to anyone looking for an in depth cyber security course.
testimonials.data: I was looking for an opportunity to explore cyber security and that opportunity was provided to me by Imarticus. This course is the most concrete course I could find online. The faculty from IIT R has been

QnA.head: How do I enrol in the course?
QnA.data: You can start by filling up your application form. If you clear the minimum criteria, you will have to go through the interview. Once you are shortlisted, you can enrol in this program.

QnA.head: What if I miss a class?
QnA.data: All the lectures will be available for the students to view on the Imarticus platform after the class is over. However, we recommend not to miss any class.

QnA.head: Is there any attendance or minimum score policy for the course?
QnA.data: Yes, the minimum attendance policy for the complete course is 80%, and the minimum marks in all assessments for successful course completion is 50%. You will also need to complete all the assignments and projects per the instructions.

QnA.head: Where do I attend these live classes?
QnA.data: You can attend the classes anywhere on your laptop with an internet connection. You can join the live class through our learning platform.

QnA.head: Does IIT faculty deliver live sessions?
QnA.data: Yes, the IIT faculty will train you and help you build a solid cyber security foundation for your career. Industry experts will provide hands-on learning through projects and exercises.

QnA.head: When will live sessions be conducted?
QnA.data: The live sessions will be scheduled on weekends – Saturday and Sunday, and 3 hours on Saturday and Sunday.

QnA.head: What is Campus Immersion?
QnA.data: There is a 3-day campus immersion module at IIT Roorkee during which participants will visit the campus to interact with their peers and learn from faculty. However, this is subject to the COVID-19 situation. The students will bear the cost of travel and accommodation.

QnA2.head: Am I eligible to join the cybersecurity program?
QnA2.data: The eligibility criteria for joining the program is - Bachelor's/Master’s degrees in Computer Science/Engineering/Math /Statistics/ Economics/Science with a minimum of 50% marks in graduation.Basic programming knowledge is required.

QnA2.head: How will the career services work?
QnA2.data: Imarticus will provide career services to the students who successfully complete the course. We will help you build your resume and prepare you with career mentorship and mock interviews.

QnA2.head: Will IIT Roorkee be helping with the placements?
QnA2.data: No. Imarticus will offer placement assistance. CEC, IIT Roorkee will only be involved in the training and certification of the students.

QnA3.head: What are the fees for the program?
QnA3.data: Advanced Certification Program in Cyber Security costs INR 1,40,000+GST. You can pay by credit card, debit card or net banking from all leading banks. We offer EMI loan options as well.

fsd.joinfsd: Our Full Stack Developer Pro course will teach you the subtleties of data structures and algorithms. This job-assured 6-month program will prepare you for a successful career as a full-stack web developer by providing you with the technical knowledge of front-end and back-end programming. With 350 hours of rigorous instruction with a distinguished faculty and 100 hours of doubt-resolution, the program offers the most training hours in the industry.

joinfsdbox.heading: Placement Guarantee
joinfsdbox.data: Get access to 500+ hiring partners and land a job with a minimum salary of 5 LPA or we will refund your fees.

joinfsdbox.heading: Dedicated Career Services
joinfsdbox.data: Our career services include resume development, profile enhancement, interview preparation workshops and one-on-one career counselling to ensure you land the right job.

joinfsdbox.heading: Job-focused Curriculum
joinfsdbox.data: Develop a strong foundation in data structures and learn popular technologies like Java, Spring, MongoDB, JavaScript, React, Docker, and Jenkins and top the list of potential employers.

joinfsdbox2.data: Work on a multiple projects and build a robust project portfolio to make your resume stand out in front of potential employers.

QnA.head: What is the duration of the program?
QnA.data: This is a 6-month program with live online lectures conducted on weekdays (Monday to Thursday) during the evening. Fridays will be off. You will also attend live hands-on sessions on Saturday and Sunday during the evening.

QnA.head: What study material will be provided to me for the program?
QnA.data: The core learning will happen via online live lectures on weekdays and online or classroom sessions on weekends. In addition, you will get recordings of the online lectures to review at your own convenience. You will also have access to student notes, exercises, additional study material and assessments on our fully-integrated online learning portal.

QnA.head: What are the fees for the program?
QnA.data: The Full Stack Developer Pro fee is INR 1,19,000/-.

QnA2.head: What is the admission process?
QnA2.data: You will have to apply for admission through our website. Our career advisor will connect with you to review your profile and other eligibility criteria. Once you are shortlisted, you will have to take an admission test. Once you pass the admission test, the admission offer letter will be released. You will have to pay the registration fees to book your seat. For more information, speak to your career advisor.

facultydatashow.name: Abhinandan Chivate
facultydatashow.description: Abhinandan has 14 years of experience and expertise in application design and development of web applications using Java, Java EE, Mongo DB, Swagger, JavaScript, React Native, NodeJs, ReactJs, Angular JS, Express Js and Mobile Applications. Abhinandan is a sun-certified Java professional with a training experience of 8 years. He has extensive experience in delivering training for top companies like Oracle Financial Software Services, Genpact, Hexaware, Deutsche Bank, Cognizant, etc.

facultydatashow.name: Naveen Kumar
facultydatashow.description: Naveen is a senior software consultant with expertise in software engineering, full-stack development, DBMS, DevOps and software testing. As a consultant, he has developed and delivered multiple software projects for his clients using Java, Spring, JavaScript, React, Node, MongoDB, Docker, Jenkins, etc. Naveen has extensive experience in delivering training at top enterprises like Tesco, Accenture, Apple, Samsung, Oracle, Standard Chartered, Siemens, etc. He is also a visiting faculty at various universities for MCA, M.Tech, BE, BCA and MBA programs.

facultydatashow.name: Shalini Mittal
facultydatashow.description: Shalini is a software professional with 10+ years of consultancy experience. Her expertise lies in web and application development using JavaScript, JQuery, Java 8, Java EE, JSP, Struts Spring, Spring Boot, Android, web services (REST-based, SOAP-based), Hibernate, Python, Web UI, Angular, RDBMS etc. Shalini is an Oracle Certified Java Professional. She has extensive experience in delivering training for top companies like Mastercard, Nomura, Oracle, J P Morgan Chase, Prudential Global, JLT, Infotech and L&T.
